name: The Secret Room
description:
There is dust all over the place.  It looks like nobody has been here
for ages.  In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe.
The globe glows with a pulsing light.  To the north you see a stone door.
To the south you see a grey block.

exits.description: You see a round stone door.
exits.keywords: door round stone~ 1 -1 7304 D2 You see a grey block.

extra_descriptions.description: The socket looks like the work of a dwarf.  It is VERY beautiful.

The crystal globe is glowing with a pulsing light.  It looks like there is
smoke inside it.
